lom:description.lom:string: This is a course Web page for an Iowa State University Senior level class. Mat E 423. Glass Science and Engineering. Included are lecture notes, laboratory exercises, links to homework solutions and exams. Lectures include a broad range of topics including composition, structure, properties manufacturing and uses of inorganic glasses, with an emphasis in silicate glasses. Laboratory descriptions include batching, melting, and characterizing the density, thermal expansion, and the mechanical, electrical, and optical properties of a glass.

lom:keyword.lom:string: glass batching, glass melting, glass characterization, glass properties

lom:title.lom:string: Coursework in Glass Science and Engineering
